title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1722.5 - Charges for legal services rendered to committee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1722.5 - Charges for legal services rendered to committee

State Regulations

Charges for legal services rendered to
the committee of the estate will not be allowed unless the nature thereof and
the occasion for the expenditure are shown. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
1722.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
